Croque Monsieur

A delicious quick snack

Home page

Ingredients

Preparing the mixture

  • 4 eggplants
  • 4 Potatoes
  • 1 Onion
  • 100g butter
  • 100g flour
  • 750mL milk
  • 500g+ ground beef
  • Thyme
  • Garlic
  • Nutmeg
  • 400g Chopped tomatoes
  • Tomato paste
  • cinamon
  • Ground cloves

Recipe

  1. preheat oven 200C
  2. Brush baing pan (25x30) pan with olive oil
  3. 2 potatoes + 1 onion in the bowl. Salt pepper and thyme
  4. Spread thin layer bottom of baking pan
  5. Bake for 20 minutes, soften slightly and turn golden
  6. Thin slices of Eggplants
  7. Olive oil, salt, pepper, thyme
  8. spread eggplant (4) slices over the potatoes
  9. Bake for 20 minutes
  10. Heat pan, olive oil, minced onion, caramelised
  11. Add clove of garlic
  12. 1/2 teaspoon cinamon, pinch of ground cloves
  13. Huge difference to Put spices on their own before adding the meat
  14. 1 table spoon of tomato paste
  15. Ground meat (500g)
  16. Add Jar of chopped tomatoes & saute for 5-10 minutes (most liquid need to evaporate)
  17. Set aside and prep the bechamel
  18. Sauce pan on medium heat
  19. 100g butter
  20. when butter is melted (not burnt) add 100g flour
  21. whisk constantly
  22. Add 750mL milk slowly and in small batches to prevent lumps of flour from forming
  23. Remove from heat when bechamel starts to bubble
  24. Add ground pepper and nutmeg and 100g parmesan
  25. Add 3 egg yolks and mix
  26. Mix 1/3rd of this sauce to the ground meat
  27. finish the dish
  28. Oven for 25-30 minutes or until brown & bubbly

Notes
